category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 5 (Restrictions on agenda items)
contents: Article 5 (Restrictions on Proposal of Agenda) Agenda rejected at the general meeting or an agenda with a similar purpose may not be brought up to the meeting again unless six months have elapsed from the time it was rejected. However, this does not apply when there is the approval of more than two-thirds of registered directors or registered delegates.
